snippet: Flavia Roman is unlikely to face criminal charges but may face administrative charges for not being at her post when Amar Diarrassouba was hit.
abstract: Flavia Roman, school crossing guard who was not at her assigned intersection in East Harlem when a truck hit and killed 6-year-old Amar Diarrassouba, is unlikely to face criminal charges.
lead_paragraph: Flavia Roman is unlikely to face criminal charges but may face administrative charges for not being at her post when Amar Diarrassouba was hit.

headline.seo: Guard Was Not at East Harlem Crossing When Truck Killed Boy, 6
headline.main: Guard Said She Was at Post Before Truck Killed Boy, 6
headline.print_headline: Guard Said She Was at Post Before Truck Killed Boy, 6
